## hpr2410 :: OLF 2017 Report

 Ohio LinuxFest 2017 is a Free and Open Source Software convention in Columbus, Ohio, and presents a variety of talks over the entire weekend. In this episode I tell you about my own personal experience at Ohio LinuxFest this year.
Links:

https://ohiolinux.org/
https://sfconservancy.org/
https://start.fedoraproject.org/
https://www.sip.us/
https://www.hurricanelabs.com/
https://welcome.linode.com/features-1gb
https://www.ixsystems.com/blog/developers-corner-dru-lavigne/
https://www.freenas.org/
https://hackersvanguard.com/

https://www.sovereigncyberindustries.com/
https://www.opennms.com/
